content: {"name": "Church of the Redeemer Baptist ", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call the State Representative, Jordan Harris at +1 (215) 952-3378 in order to get a food voucher to be used at this pantry.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.cotrb.org", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1440 South 24th Street", "address_2": "", "city": "Point Breeze", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19146", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9340601, "longitude": -75.1845877}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 952-3378", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Handicapped Access"}]}
